choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews
### Assistant:

Here is your weekly meal plan, based on the food restrictions you provided. Each day has three meals, with a variety of options to choose from for each meal. 
Day 1: Breakfast - Oatmeal with almond milk (no nut butter or pistachios) and fresh fruit; Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing; Dinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (no garlic), quinoa, and side of steamed broccoli
Day 2: Breakfast - Scrambled eggs with spinach and whole-wheat toast; Lunch - Tuna salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing; Dinner - Vegetable stir fry (no garlic or honey) with tofu and brown rice
Day 3: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with almond milk, banana, spinach, and chia seeds; Lunch - Grilled chicken wrap with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing; Dinner - Vegetable lasagna (no garlic or honey) with whole-wheat pasta and side of steamed broccoli
Day 4: Breakfast - Whole-wheat toast with peanut butter and sliced banana; Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing; Dinner - Baked cod with roasted vegetables (no garlic), quinoa, and side of steamed broccoli
Day 5: Breakfast - Omelette with spinach, mushrooms, and whole-wheat toast; Lunch - Tuna salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing; Dinner - Vegetable stir fry (no garlic or honey) with tofu and brown rice
Day 6: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with almond milk, banana, spinach, and chia seeds; Lunch - Grilled chicken wrap with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing; Dinner - Vegetable lasagna (no garlic or honey) with whole-wheat pasta and side of steamed broccoli
Day 7: Breakfast - Whole-wheat toast with peanut butter and sliced banana; Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing; Dinner - Vegetable stir fry (no garlic or honey) with tofu and brown rice<|im_end|>
